remarks: A complex module is a left module over a subring of the complex numbers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
isclm.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
isclm.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
isclm $p |- ( W e. CMod <-> ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) $.
